thread.section_title: California Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of California Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Elizabeth C
title: Great location
text:
We stayed for 4 nights & had a fantastic visit ... great staff, very comfortable room & free wifi was a bonus ... 10 minute walk to train station, walking distance to the Colesseum & Ancient Rome ... great restaurants & markets nearby, excellent laundry a few doors down the street ... breakfast in the hotel each morning was delicious
Room Tip: We were on floor 5, quiet & cosy See more room tips
